nodes.text: Dnalvec was the main port city of Sriluur, which housed three of the four main spaceports on the planet. It was a chaotic frontier environment of drifting star pilots, information merchants, and mercenaries.
It was home to the Weequay's Dnalvec Militia. The Houk Territories were located less than 30 kilometers to the north, and there was a substantial Houk population in the city.
The Boneglass Canyon connected it to the northern edge of the Copper Coast twenty-five kilometers away.
